summary: A teacher manages to get her toughest class involved in a collective project that could give a whole new meaning to the lives of her students.
cast: Ariane Ascaride|Ahmed Dramé|Noémie Merlant|Geneviève Mnich|Stéphane Bak|Wendy Nieto|Aïmen Derriachi|Mohamed Seddiki|Naomi Amarger|Alicia Dadoun|Adrien Hurdubae|Raky Sall|Amine Lansari|Koro Dramé|Thomas Bénéteau|Elyes Souissi|Yume Nanbu|Clara Choï|Akim Mebtouch|Gabriel Beaudet|Tristan Marhoum|Ilyan Pacini|Henda Sissoko|Sanna Léon|Manon Amram|Vivian Porte|Xavier Maly|Anne Benoit|Gladys Cohen|Léon Zyguel|Martin Cavanno|Sylvie Turowski|Véronique Fermon|Marie Duchamp|Mary Herson|Julie Martel|Aminata Diakité|Lionel Cecilio|Katia Touati|Samia Sassi|Jassem Mougari|Christian Drillaud|Khadim Sylla|Yassin Amir|Alexis Heintz|Marion Zanetti|Arnaud Colas|Alain Tissier|Simone Veil
title: La profesora de historia
